findings.title: Use one file for each contract or library
findings.description: The ShellProtocol is a highly complex system with deep library usage spanning multiple files, including libraries that include other libraries.

findings.title: Commented out code should be removed or dealt with in a separate branch
findings.description: Having commented out code increases the cognitive load on an already complex system and hides important parts of the system that should get proper attention. It also needs to be maintained but will be out of date if other parts of the system are changed, and tests will not pick that up.
